questions.example: Ich warte ___ den Bus.
questions.translation: I'm waiting for the bus.

questions.translation: I'm thinking about my family.

questions.translation: She takes care of her grandmother.

questions.translation: We are talking about the weather.

questions.translation: He is interested in sports.

questions.example: Lass uns ___ der Arbeit anfangen.
questions.translation: Let's start with the work.

questions.example: Das Buch gehört ___ mir.
questions.translation: The book belongs to me.

questions.example: Ich glaube ___ dich.
questions.translation: I believe in you.

questions.translation: He is complaining about the noise.

questions.example: Sie nimmt ___ dem Kurs teil.

questions.example: Ich gewöhne mich ___ das neue Haus.
questions.translation: I'm getting used to the new house.

questions.example: Ich zweifle ___ seiner Geschichte.
questions.translation: I doubt his story.

questions.example: Sie leidet ___ Kopfschmerzen.

questions.example: Du kannst dich ___ mich verlassen.
questions.translation: You can rely on me.

questions.translation: The team consists of five players.

questions.example: Ich konzentriere mich ___ die Arbeit.
questions.translation: I'm concentrating on the work.

questions.translation: The parliament is voting on the proposal.

questions.example: Ich sehne mich ___ den Sommer.
questions.translation: I'm longing for summer.

questions.example: Er verzichtet ___ das Dessert.
questions.translation: He's giving up dessert.

questions.example: Diese Vase stammt ___ China.
questions.translation: This vase comes from China.

questions.translation: The mother worries about her children.

questions.example: Wir richten uns ___ dem Wetter.
questions.translation: We adjust according to the weather.

questions.example: Ich rechne ___ deiner Unterstützung.

questions.example: Das Unternehmen profitiert ___ der Entwicklung.
questions.translation: The company benefits from the development.

questions.example: Er neigt ___ Übertreibungen.
questions.translation: He tends to exaggerate.

questions.translation: I'm inquiring at the bank.

questions.translation: This version differs from the old one.

questions.example: Sie verfügt ___ viel Erfahrung.
